meanings.sent1: She pretends to be a princess when she plays with her toys.
meanings.sent2: He pretends to be a superhero when he wears his cape.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretends to be invisible when it hides behind the curtain.
meanings.sent4: The sun pretends to sleep behind the clouds before it rises in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The tree pretends to dance in the wind as its branches sway back and forth.

meanings.sent1: The child pretends to be sick to avoid going to school.
meanings.sent2: She pretends to like broccoli even though she really doesn't.
meanings.sent3: The dog pretends to be asleep to trick the cat.
meanings.sent4: His smile pretends to be genuine, but his eyes reveal the truth.
meanings.sent5: The actor pretends to cry on stage, but his tears are real.

meanings.sent1: The scammer pretends to be a bank official to steal personal information.
meanings.sent2: He pretends to have won the lottery to impress his friends.
meanings.sent3: The student pretends to have forgotten the homework to buy more time.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter pretends to hide the pain she feels inside.
meanings.sent5: The politician pretends to care about the environment for votes, but his actions say otherwise.
